overview: Mr. George Mover is a professional engineer and is the former Project General Director of Ferrexpo Yeristovo Mining, a subsidiary of Ferrexpo AG. At Ferrexpo, Mr. Mover led the development of an open pit iron ore mine and refinery slated to produce 10 million tonnes per annum of pellets. Mr. Mover’s career has provided him the opportunities to work in Ukraine, across many other former Soviet countries and in North America. He will play a significant role in helping Black Iron operate in Ukraine, while maintaining the controls and standards expected by international capital markets. Mr. Mover has also previously had overall responsibility for the development of one of the world’s largest silver deposits in north eastern Russia on behalf of Pan American Silver Corporation; was Vice President CIS Operations for World Wide Minerals accountable to restart four uranium mines and processing plants in Kazakhstan; and was Resident Manager Magadan for Davy International EPCM consultants.
